mapper.select:
SELECT t2.id,t1.batch_no, t2.tax_real, t2.annuity, t2.working_years, t2.business_health_insurance, t2.endowment_insurance, t2.domestic_days, t2.overseas_days, t2.domestic_income_domestic_payment, t2.domestic_income_overseas_payment, t2.overseas_income_domestic_payment, t2.overseas_income_overseas_payment, t2.housing_subsidy, t2.meal_allowance, t2.laundry_fee, t2.removing_indemnity_fee, t2.missionallowance, t2.visiting_relatives_fee, t2.language_training_fee, t2.education_funds, t2.exercise_income_month, t2.exercise_income_year, t2.number_of_months, t2.exercise_tax_amount ,t2.employee_no,t2.employee_name,t2.id_type,t2.id_no,t2.period,t2.income_subject,t2.income_total,t2.income_dutyfree,t2.deduct_retirement_insurance,t2.deduct_medical_insurance ,t2.deduct_dleness_insurance,t2.deduct_property,t2.deduct_house_fund,t2.deduct_takeoff,t2.deduct_other,t2.deduct_total,t2.deduction,t2.donation,t2.income_for_tax ,t2.tax_rate,t2.quick_cal_deduct,t2.tax_amount,t2.tax_deduction,t2.tax_withhold_amount,t2.tax_withholded_amount,t2.tax_remedy_or_return ,t3.declare_account,t3.pay_account,t3.receipt_account,t3.support_no,t3.support_name,t3.is_support,t3.is_supported,t3.is_pay,t3.is_payed,t3.is_declare ,t3.is_declared,t3.is_transfer,t3.is_transferred,t3.is_declare_supported,t3.is_transfer_supported,t3.is_pay_supported FROM tax_fc_calculation_batch t1,tax_fc_calculation_batch_detail t2,tax_fc_employee_service_batch t3 where t1.is_active = true and t2.is_defer !=true and t1.id = t2.calculation_batch_id and t2.id = t3.cal_batch_detail_id AND t1.id in
#{batchId}

SELECT t2.task_no FROM tax_fc_calculation_batch_task_main t1 left join tax_fc_task_main t2 on t1.task_main_id = t2.id where 1=1 and t2.is_active=true and t2.status!='05' and t1.cal_batch_id = #{calBatchId} ORDER BY t2.created_time desc
mapper.update: /*update tax_fc_calculation_batch_detail t1 inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch t2 on t1.calculation_batch_id = t2.id SET t1.is_active = false where t2.id = #{calBatchId}*/ delete tax_fc_calculation_batch_detail t1 inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch t2 on t1.calculation_batch_id = t2.id where t2.id = #{calBatchId}

/*update tax_fc_employee_info_batch t1 inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch_detail t2 on t1.cal_batch_detail_id = t2.id inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch t3 on t2.calculation_batch_id = t3.id SET t1.is_active = false where t3.id = #{calBatchId}*/ delete tax_fc_employee_info_batch t1 inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch_detail t2 on t1.cal_batch_detail_id = t2.id inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch t3 on t2.calculation_batch_id = t3.id where t3.id = #{calBatchId}

/*update tax_fc_employee_service_batch t1 inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch_detail t2 on t1.cal_batch_detail_id = t2.id inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch t3 on t2.calculation_batch_id = t3.id SET t1.is_active = false where t3.id = #{calBatchId}*/ delete tax_fc_employee_service_batch t1 inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch_detail t2 on t1.cal_batch_detail_id = t2.id inner join tax_fc_calculation_batch t3 on t2.calculation_batch_id = t3.id where t3.id = #{calBatchId}
